documentation.text: @dev This function sets the Voting Contract address

@dev This function returns contribution data
 @param contributionId Id of the contribution whose data you want
@dev This function sets the Voting Contract address

@dev This function returns contribution data
 @param contributionId Id of the contribution whose data you want

createNewContribution(uint256[],string,s.details: This function will be called by the user to create a new contribution

params.communityReward: this is the amount of community token that the contributor is requesting for his work contribution.
params.description: this is the description of the new contriution that is created.
params.governanceReward: this is the amount of governance token that the contributor is requesting for his work contribution.
params.previewFile: this is preview file of the contribution
params.previewFileHash: this is hash of the preview file
params.recordId: this is the id of the record to which contribution belongs to.
params.roughMix: this represents if a contribution is a roughMix or is a new contribution
params.tracks: Id of tracks that are part of this contribution

createSeedContribution(uint256[],string,.details: This function will be called by the user to create a new seed contribution as there will be not voting or anything like that

params.description: this is the description of the new contriution that is created.
params.previewFile: this is preview file of the contribution
params.previewFileHash: this is hash of the preview file
params.tracks: Id of tracks that are part of this contribution

params.contributionId: Id of the contribution whose data you want

setContributionVotingContractAddress(add.details: This function sets the Voting Contract address
